metadata.name: MSExchange Transport Agent Installation
metadata.comment: Detects the Installation of a Exchange Transport Agent

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('install-transportagent')))

output.summary: Detects the Installation of a Exchange Transport Agent

metadata.objective: Examine fields: AssemblyPath False positive: Legitimate installations of exchange TransportAgents. AssemblyPath is a good indicator for this. Reference: https://speakerdeck.com/heirhabarov/hunting-for-persistence-via-microsoft-exchange-server-or-outlook?slide=7
